text: Nassarius lawsonorum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Mozambique and South Africa. ==References== * Marais J.P. & Kilburn R.N. (2010) Nassariidae. pp. 138–173, in: Marais A.P. & Seccombe A.D. (eds), Identification guide to the seashells of South Africa. Volume 1. Groenkloof: Centre for Molluscan Studies. 376 pp Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2000
title: Nassarius lawsonorum
